home_page.multiplierInfo1: 1) Boost your winnings and points by using an extra ticket.
home_page.multiplierInfo2: 2) Every x1 multiplier, an extra ticket is needed to increase the boost.
home_page.multiplierInfo3: 3) Once the multiplier bet is confirmed, it cannot be cancelled or reduced.
